summary: PLEASE REFER TO YOUR CAMPAIGN NUMBER I3V588000.  IT APPEARS THAT MORE CARS ARE AFFECTED THAN ORIGINALLY THOUGHT.  MY CAR IS EXPERIENCING THE SAME PROBLEM BUT HAS NOT BEEN RECALLED.  SUPPOSEDLY, INFINITI RECALLED ALL 23 CARS THAT WERE AFFECTED.  THERE ARE OBVIOUSLY MANY MORE VEHICLES EQUIPPED WITH DAS THAT ARE EXPERIENCING THIS PROBLEM.  *TR
